show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Japandemonium
content:
A detailed discussion of the madness that afflicts the monetary authorities in Japan. <!--more--> It’s just a face-saving manoeuvre for the government and cannot lead to anything positive at all.
But it can bring down the entire world finances.
Even in Japan there’s been no recovery with rampant ‘QE’.
Japan’s government is perilously close to bankruptcy.
Also discussed: the consequences.
The consequences of the end of ‘QE’ in the US Total debt levels.
Chaos is drawing inexorably closer.
Stock market report.
What will bring it down.
The nature of the ‘too-big-to-fail’ banks.
Homeownership rates in the US have fallen to the lowest in more than 19 years.
